title: Donga-Mantung
text:
Donga-Mantung is a <a href="Departments%20of%20Cameroon">division</a> of the <a href="Northwest%20Province%20%28Cameroon%29">Northwest Region</a> of <a href="Cameroon">Cameroon</a>. The division covers an area of 4279 km and as of 2001 had a total population of 337,533.The capital city of the division is <a href="Nkamb%C3%A9">Nkambe</a>.
Subdivisions.
The department is divided administratively into 5 <a href="Communes%20of%20Cameroon">communes</a> and in turn into villages.
